name: He Huang
content: He Huang @ Soochow University He Huang Home Publications Professional Activities Chinese Version Distinguished Professor, Associate Dean IEEE Senior Member, CCF Senior Member, ACM Member School of Computer Science and Technology Soochow University ROOM 235, Ligong Building 1# Shizi Road, Gusu District Suzhou 215006, P.R. China Email: A@suda.edu.cn (A<-->huangh) RECRUITING I am looking for well motivated students to work on cutting-edge research projects. All students are welcome! You can directly contact me by E-mail. WHAT'S NEWS! May.2023 Our work named SwitchSketch is accepted by ACM SIGMOD 2024! May.2023 I will be serving on the TPC of IEEE INFOCOM 2024! Jan.2023 Our two papers are accepted by ACM WWW 2023! Dec.2022 Our work named Better Cardinality Estimator with Fewer Bits, Constant Update Time, and Mergeability is accpected by IEEE INFOCOM 2023! Nov.2022 Our work named Practical Parallel Algorithms for Submodular Maximization subject to a Knapsack Constraint with Nearly Optimal Adaptivity is accpected by AAAI 2023! Oct.2022 Our work on Streaming Algorithms for Constrained Submodular Maximization is accpected by ACM SIGMETRICS 2023! Jun.2022 I will serve as the Lead Guest Editor of TNSE SI on Traffic Measurement! Dec.2021 We have 30 papers (including IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking(4), IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing(4), JSAC, IEEE INFOCOM, IEEE ICML, IEEE ICDE) this year! Dec.2020 We have 20 papers (including IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking, IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing, SIGMETRICS 2021, IEEE INFOCOM 2021) this year! Feb.2020 One paper entitled "An Efficient K-persistent Spread Estimator for Traffic Measurement in High-speed Networks" accepted by the IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking! Dec.2019 We have 15 papers (including IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing, VLDB, IEEE Transactions on Services Computing, Internet of Things Journal, IEEE INFOCOM 2020) this year! Dec.2018 We have 14 papers (including IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking, Internet of Things Journal, IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing, IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, IEEE INFOCOM 2019, ACM MobiHoc 2018, IEEE WCNC 2018, IEEE MASS 2018) this year! Jul.2018 One paper entitled "Persistent Traffic Measurement Through Vehicle-to-Infrastructure Communications in Cyber-Physical Road Systems" to appear in the IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing! Jul.2018 One paper entitled "Quality-Aware Pricing for Mobile Crowdsensing" published in the IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking! Apr.2018 One paper entitled "You Can Drop but You Can't Hide: K-persistent Spread Estimation in High-speed Networks" to appear in the proceeding of the IEEE INFOCOM 2018! Jan.2018 One paper entitled "Achieving High Scalability Through Hybrid Switching in Software-Defined Networking" to appear in IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking! Dec.2017 We have 12 papers (including IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking, IEEE INFOCOM 2017, IEEE ICDCS 2017, ACM MobiHoc 2017, IEEE ICDM 2017, IEEE WCNC 2017) this year! Dec.2016 We published 9 papers (including IEEE ICNP 2016, ACM MobiHoc 2016, IEEE ICDCS 2016, IEEE SECON 2016) this year! Dec.2015 We published 12 papers (including IEEE TMC, IEEE TPDS, IEEE SECON) this year! Jul.2014 One paper entitled "Truthful Auction Mechanisms with Performance Guarantee in Secondary Spectrum Markets" to appear in IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing! Apr.2014 One paper entitled "PPS: Privacy-Preserving Strategyproof Social-Efficient Spectrum Auction Mechanisms" to appear in IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems! Short Biography I am a Professor and Associate Dean of the School of Computer Science and Technology at Soochow University, P. R. China, where I also direct the Institutes of Network Science and Engineering. I received my Ph.D. from Department of Computer Science and Technology, University of Science and Technology of China. My advisor is Prof. Guoliang Chen. After graduating from USTC, I joined Soochow University as a lecturer in 2011, and was promoted to associate professor in 2013 and to professor in 2018. From 2019 to 2020, I was a visiting research scholar with Florida University, Gainesville, United States. I published 100+ peer-reviewed journal/conference papers and have 13 Chinese patents. I am a member of IEEE and the Association for Computing Machinery (ACM). My research interests include traffic measurement for high-speed Internet, Software Defined Networks, mobile computing, privacy and security, cyber-physical systems, and algorithms. I have been supported by China NSF, with the total support of more than 3.0 million CNY. My students and I won three best paper awards (Bigcom 2016, IEEE MSN 2018, IEEE Bigcom 2018). I am currently serving as an associate editor of 2 international journals, including Internet of Things and Cyber-Physical Systems Journal, Frontiers in the Internet of Things. I served at various capacities (publicity chair, publication chair, and technical program committee) in a number of conferences, e.g., Publicity Co-Chair of ACM MobiHoc-MSCC 2016, Publication Chair of the Second IEEE INFOCOM Workshop on Networking Algorithms (WNA) in conjunction with IEEE INFOCOM 2022, TPC member of IEEE INFOCOM, IEEE MASS, IEEE ICC, and IEEE Globecom.
